name.ja: <ruby>影<rt>かげ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>王<rt>ジェネレイド</rt></ruby> レイヴァーテイン

text.en:
2+ Level 9 monsters
You can only control 1 "Laevateinn, Generaider Boss of Shadows". All monsters your opponent controls lose 1000 ATK/DEF. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this Xyz Summoned card; Special Summon 1 non-Fairy "Generaider" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, then you can attach cards from the field and/or any GY(s) to it as material, up to the number of materials this card had.
